title: createing file in shared dir gives 'undefined index'
body:
when i start putting files in a dir shared to me, i keep getting an undefined index error:

    [tue nov 20 16:17:48 2012] [error] [client 89.188.25.162] php notice:  undefined index: /shared/shareme/reparatieformulier.pdf in /var/www/owncloud-stable45/lib/connector/sabre/directory.php on line 149
    [tue nov 20 16:17:48 2012] [error] [client 89.188.25.162] php notice:  undefined index: /shared/shareme/reparatieformulier.pdf in /var/www/owncloud-stable45/lib/connector/sabre/directory.php on line 149
    [tue nov 20 16:17:59 2012] [error] [client 89.188.25.162] php notice:  undefined index: /shared/shareme/reparatieformulier.pdf in /var/www/owncloud-stable45/lib/connector/sabre/directory.php on line 149

version: 326496ff808dab5572ec06a8e8a7babe63d0bedb (branch stable-45 as of fri nov 16 08:12:24 2012 -0800)
mysql
new install

steps
* new install
* as admin create: sharer/user1/user2
* login as sharer
* make dir shareme with webgui
* share it to user1 with edit permissions
* login as user1 in webgui
* configure client sync to sync /shared folder to a local disk folder
* put a file in 'shareme'
* seems to work, but gives undefined index error.
